00029   using boost::TIME_UTC;

00033   struct HiResTime : public boost::xtime {
00034     HiResTime(int type = TIME_UTC) { reset(type); }
00035 
00039     bool reset(int type = TIME_UTC) {
00040       return boost::xtime_get(this, type) != 0;
00041     }
00042 
00046     int cmp(const HiResTime &y) const {
00047       return boost::xtime_cmp(*this, y);
00048     }
00049 
00050     bool operator<(const HiResTime &y) const { return cmp(y) < 0; }
00051     bool operator==(const HiResTime &y) const { return cmp(y) == 0; }
00052   };
